title: Treasure Hunter
body: An adventure game for Windows where players explore different environments, solve riddles, and uncover hidden treasures while racing against time.

title: Daily Coding Challenge
body: A web app that offers users a new coding problem each day, allowing them to practice and improve their programming skills while tracking their performance over time.

title: Local Food Finder
body: A mobile app that alerts users to food trucks and pop-up restaurants in their area, featuring menus and user reviews to help them discover new culinary experiences.
